SEARCH
Package Manager

Class ManagerBoundary

java.lang.Object
Manager.ManagerBoundary
public class ManagerBoundary extends Object
The ManagerBoundary class handles the manager's user interface interactions including profile updates, project management, application approvals, enquiry responses, and report generation. This boundary acts as the main menu driver and interaction point for a manager user.

    Constructs a ManagerBoundary for a given Manager.

  • Method Details

    • displayManagerMenu

      public void displayManagerMenu()
      Displays the main menu options for the Manager. Provides routing to submenus such as profile, project, applications, enquiries, and reports.

      Displays options for viewing, creating, and editing projects
